name: Resident Evil 6 x Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Project
name_original: Resident Evil 6 x Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Project
description:
Resident Evil 6 x Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Project is an action-shooter game developed by Valve Software and Capcom. It came out on 05-04-2013. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Resident Evil 6 x Left 4 Dead 2 Crossover Project on PC.
